data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 21425, Version Hash: df47d2bb54e0b94e583d8de5d76ed5b7bb63d267
data.actual_result: Typing "ą" with keyboard deletes the entire draft of the message. Typing "ż" switches the character to "ź" and adds a previously deleted character
data.expected_result: User can write a message with all Polish characters without text formatting issues
data.short_description: [Discord Overlay] Input of Polish "ą" and "ż" characters results in improper behaviour of the draft messages in text box
data.steps_to_repro: - Change keyboard input to Polish (Programmer/Programisty) - Open Discord Overlay while in-game - Start typing any message in the text box - Type "ą" or "ż" characters - Observe the behaviour of the message
